DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of dapsone in subjects with acne vulgaris following 12 weeks of treatment.
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Efficacy, and Treatment Adherence of Dapsone in Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Participation in Allergan study 225678004 Anticipates the need for surgery or hospitalization during the study
